nodes.text: Battle For Theed is a free three-page promotional comic featured as Star Wars Roleplaying Game Free Sneak Preview. The short comic was written by Michael A. Stackpole. It takes place in 32 BBY, during the Occupation of Theed.

During the Occupation of Naboo, a small unit of the Naboo Underground; consisting of Jedi Padawan Sia-Lan Wezz, Deel Surool, Arani Korden, Rorworr, and his translator droid TD0-2; are hiding in an alley in Theed. Planning to escape through a door at the end of the alley, Arani, Rorworr, and Sia-Lan provide a diversion while Deel attempts to slice the lock. After surprising a group of B1-Series battle droids and fending off their reinforcements, the fighters begin to retreat down the alley as a pair of Droidekas show up. Deel opens the door, and all four members are surprised by what they see on the other side.
